mapper.select: SELECT a.rec_id AS 'recId', a.order_id AS 'orderId', c.user_id AS 'userId', a.goods_id AS 'goodsId', a.goods_name AS 'goodsName', a.goods_price AS 'goodsPrice', a.advance_price AS 'goodsAdvancePrice', sum(b.app_total_amount) AS 'orderTotalRecharge', sum(b.app_arrearage) AS 'goodsArrears', sum(b.use_balance) AS 'orderUnconsumed' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details b ON b.goods_mapping_id = a.rec_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders c ON c.order_id = a.order_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.rec_id = #{recId}

SELECT a.order_id AS 'orderId', a.user_id AS 'userId', a.order_amount AS 'orderAmount', a.total_amount AS 'totalAmount', a.pay_name AS 'payName', a.coupon_price AS 'couponPrice', a.shipping_price AS 'shippingPrice', a.order_status AS 'orderStatus', a.channel_flag AS 'channelFlag', a.is_real AS 'isReal', a.is_neworder AS 'isNeworder', GROUP_CONCAT(c.id) AS 'couponIds', GROUP_CONCAT(c.coupon_name) AS 'couponNames' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user b ON b.order_id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon c ON c.id = b.coupon_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY a.order_id

SELECT a.rec_id AS 'recId', a.order_id AS 'orderId', a.goods_id AS 'goodsId', a.goods_name AS 'goodsName', a.spec_key AS 'specKey', a.spec_key_name AS 'specKeyName', a.action_type AS 'actionType', a.is_real AS 'isReal', a.goods_price AS 'goodsPrice', a.goods_num AS 'goodsNum', a.coupon_price AS 'couponPrice', a.order_amount AS 'orderAmount', a.advance_price AS 'advancePrice', c.name AS 'categoryNameOne', c2.name AS 'categoryNameTwo', b.franchisee_id AS 'franchiseeId', f.name AS 'franchiseeName', b.goodsbrand_id AS 'goodsBrandId', e.name AS 'goodsBrandName' FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods b ON b.goods_id = a.goods_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods_category c ON c.category_id = b.category_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_goods_category c2 ON c2.category_id = c.parent_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_brand e ON e.band_id = b.goodsbrand_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_franchisee f ON f.id = b.franchisee_id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM mtmydb.mtmy_orders a WHERE a.order_status > 0 AND a.user_id = #{userId}
